title: How many past and present executors are named on the will
question: How many past and present executors are named on the will and any updates (‘codicils’)?
checklist1Header: The total number must include anyone who:
checklist1-item1: is a current executor, even if they aren’t applying for probate
checklist1-item2: was meant to be an executor but can’t be one (for example, if they’ve died and have been replaced by another executor)
notExecutorYet: Do not include anyone who has not yet become an executor.
executorsNumber: Total number of past and present executors

executorsNumber.required: Enter a valid number between 1 and 20
executorsNumber.invalid: Enter a valid number between 1 and 20
